decision_conditions: The information submitted for Condition 5 (Construction management plan) of planning permission 21/02524/CLC is consdered unacceptable. Therefore, the proposal fails to safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
description: Approval of Planning Condition 5 (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission ref: 21/02524/FUL (Erection of single storey rear extension including the side area behind main stairway (following demolition of existing single storey ground floor rear extension) and linking ground floor with basement by provision of internal stair) dated 23/09/2021
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
